name: part_001
file: tmp_【#SSholoX1周年】世界の全てを見せてやろう【お披露目満載！？】 [fzlZDM_M5bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui leads a discussion about holoX's first anniversary, revealing a new key visual, and announcing exciting upcoming events like an idol outfit live and a new original unit song.
A glitched transition with the holoX logo appearing on screen.
The members of holoX are shown as silhouettes against a dark background as they practice their official unit introduction chant.

subtitles.original: わかってます、それもそうなんだけど...
subtitles.english: I know, I know that's true, but...

subtitles.original: やはりね、ラプラスの目標は世界征服ですね。
subtitles.english: After all, La+'s goal is world domination.

subtitles.original: ああー。言ってるよねー。1年目からずっと言ってるね。
subtitles.english: Ah. She has been saying that. She's been saying it since the first year.

subtitles.original: そろそろやるんか？っていう感じだけど。本当にやるんか？ってね。
subtitles.english: It's like, "Are you finally going to do it?" Like, "Are you really going to do it?"

subtitles.original: というわけで今回もですね、世界征服に向けて前進をするために、
subtitles.english: So, this time as well, in order to move forward towards world domination,

subtitles.original: 結構ね、魅力的なものを用意しておりますので！
subtitles.english: we have prepared something quite attractive!

subtitles.original: おおー！何だ何だ？
subtitles.english: Oh! What is it, what is it?

subtitles.original: 刮目せよ！刮目せよ！
subtitles.english: Behold! Behold!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、ホワイトボードをもう一回見てみましょう。
subtitles.english: Alright, so let's take another look at the whiteboard.

subtitles.original: まずは、ホロックス1周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: First of all, happy 1st anniversary to holoX!

subtitles.original: もう1年経ったわけですけれども。今回ね、火漏れれ先生に...
subtitles.english: It's been a year already. This time, Hiwa-sensei...

subtitles.original: キービジュアルも作成していただきました。キービジュアル出るかな？どうぞ！
subtitles.english: has created a key visual for us. Will the key visual appear? Here it is!

subtitles.original: わあー！かっこいい！めっちゃかっこいい！
subtitles.english: Wow! So cool! It's so cool!

subtitles.original: この5人だったら世界征服できるよ！
subtitles.english: With these five, we can definitely conquer the world!

subtitles.original: 確かに！これ世界征服してるでしょ、もう！
subtitles.english: True! We've already conquered the world with this!

subtitles.original: ラプラスも、すごいね、興興奮してたもんね。
subtitles.english: La+ was really excited about it too, wasn't she?

subtitles.original: ねー！嬉しかったねー！
subtitles.english: Yeah! She was so happy!

subtitles.original: お部屋にも飾ってあります。ラプちゃんのね、椅子の横に。
subtitles.english: It's also displayed in the room. Right next to La-chan's chair.

subtitles.original: 良いね。おしゃれでござるな。
subtitles.english: Nice. It's so stylish.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、1年経ったということでね、ますますね...
subtitles.english: Alright, so since it's been a year, even more so...

subtitles.original: 2年目も頑張っていきたい私たちなんですけれども、
subtitles.english: we want to do our best in our second year as well,

subtitles.original: なんと2年目にして新メンバーが登場いたします！
subtitles.english: but surprisingly, in our second year, a new member will be appearing!

subtitles.original: ええー！？ええー！？ついに来たんだ！七草目？
subtitles.english: What!? What!? It's finally here! The 7th member?

subtitles.original: それが気になってるっていう人もいたんですよ。
subtitles.english: There were people who were curious about that.

subtitles.original: ねー！え、七草目もホロックスに入れていく？
subtitles.english: Yeah! Are we going to include the 7th member in holoX?

subtitles.original: 入れていく、入れていく！
subtitles.english: We're including them, we're including them!

subtitles.original: どんどん増やそうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's keep adding more!

subtitles.original: 何人来るのかもね、わからないからね。
subtitles.english: We don't even know how many people are coming.

subtitles.original: え、複数人！？大丈夫！？管理できるでござるか？
subtitles.english: What, multiple people!? Is it okay!? Can we manage them?

subtitles.original: 誰の管理をする？ 管理はでもさ、ルイ姉に任せれば...
subtitles.english: Who's going to manage them? Well, if we leave it to Lui-nee...

subtitles.original: もういらない、もういらない！なんか、我々が十分新メンバー...
subtitles.english: I don't need any more! I mean, we're already like new members ourselves...

subtitles.original: 今から出てくるのかわいそうでしょ！
subtitles.english: It'll be pitiful for the one coming out now!

subtitles.original: もう、じゃあ、手がかからない子でお願いします。
subtitles.english: Well then, please let it be a child who doesn't need much care.

subtitles.original: ああー、それは大事なのかな。手かかるかな？どうかな？
subtitles.english: Ah, that might be important. Will they be a handful? I wonder.

subtitles.original: ということで、何人来るかもお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: So, look forward to seeing how many are coming!

subtitles.original: 続いて、実はね、みんな、もうアイドル衣装はお披露目していますけれども、
subtitles.english: Next, actually, everyone has already revealed their idol outfits,

subtitles.original: みんなでアイドル衣装ライブしてみたくない？
subtitles.english: but don't you want to do an idol outfit live with everyone?

subtitles.original: やってみたいー！やったー！
subtitles.english: I want to do it! Yay!

subtitles.original: ということで、みんなで集まってライブをしましょう、ということになります。
subtitles.english: So, it means we'll all gather and have a live performance.

subtitles.original: ついに！並びたいー！
subtitles.english: Finally! I want to stand in line!

subtitles.original: ついに5人揃って、アイドル衣装になってね、踊ったり歌ったりするので、
subtitles.english: Finally, all five of us will be in idol outfits, dancing and singing,

subtitles.original: 皆さん楽しみにしててね！ワクワクだね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please look forward to it! We're so excited!

subtitles.original: 楽しみでござるな。そして、そして、最後。これがね、すごい、もう目玉。
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to it. And, and, finally. This is the big highlight.

subtitles.original: ユニットオリジナル楽曲を、本日、初披露いたします！
subtitles.english: We will perform our unit original song for the first time today!

subtitles.original: わあー！これめっちゃいいから、マジで！
subtitles.english: Wow! This is really good, seriously!

subtitles.original: 本当にいいから！めっちゃ聴いて。盛り上がるよね！
subtitles.english: It's really good! Listen to it a lot. It's so exciting!

subtitles.original: ありえないくらいいいでござるよね！
subtitles.english: It's unbelievably good!

subtitles.original: もうね、始まる前にスタッフさんが口ずさむくらい耳に残る！
subtitles.english: It's so catchy that even the staff members were humming it before we started!

subtitles.original: そうそう！しかもかっこいいんだよね！
subtitles.english: Exactly! And it's so cool!

subtitles.original: 頑張ったよ！頑張ったよ、見てほしい。
subtitles.english: We worked hard! We worked hard, so please watch it.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、本当に目白押しなんですけれども、
subtitles.english: Yes, so it's truly packed with highlights,

subtitles.original: 早速ね、新メンバーの方を待たせておりますので、移動しましょう。
subtitles.english: but we're already keeping the new member waiting, so let's move.

subtitles.original: いらないって言われた新メンバー！手のかからない子だったら欲しいのよ。
subtitles.english: The new member who was told they weren't needed! I want them if they don't need care.

subtitles.original: ということで、新メンバーのところに、レッツ・ゴー！
subtitles.english: So, to the new member's place, let's go!

subtitles.original: レッツ・ゴー！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: そこに跪け！
subtitles.english: Kneel before us!

subtitles.original: 掃いて捨てるような現実を、
subtitles.english: A reality like something swept away and discarded,

subtitles.original: 一刀両断、
subtitles.english: We'll cut it down,

subtitles.original: 叩き斬る！
subtitles.english: with a single stroke!

subtitles.original: 終わりなき輪廻なれば良し、これよ。
subtitles.english: If it's an endless cycle of rebirth, then so be it.

subtitles.original: 漆黒の翼で誘おう。
subtitles.english: Let us invite you with pitch-black wings.

subtitles.original: 我ら、平穏を蹂躙せしもの、秘密結社holoX！
subtitles.english: We are the ones who trample over peace, Secret Society holoX!

subtitles.original: 今の決まったんじゃない！？
subtitles.english: Didn't we nail that just now!?

subtitles.original: めっちゃかっこいい！
subtitles.english: It was so cool!

subtitles.original: もう一回、次やってみる？
subtitles.english: Should we try the next one?

subtitles.original: あ、沙花叉、タカネになろう。
subtitles.english: Ah, Sakamata, I'll be Takane.

subtitles.original: あ、いろはになろう。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll be Iroha.

subtitles.original: ござる、タカネ、ござる...何だかちょっと違う気がする。
subtitles.english: Gozaru, Takane, gozaru... I feel like something's a bit off.

subtitles.original: 見たいぞ。いくぞ、せーの！
subtitles.english: I want to see that. Let's go, ready, set!

subtitles.original: せーの！そこに跪け！
subtitles.english: Ready, set! Kneel before us!

subtitles.original: そこに跪け！掃いて捨てるような現実を、
subtitles.english: Kneel before us! A reality like something swept away and discarded,

subtitles.original: 一刀両断、叩き斬る！
subtitles.english: We'll cut it down with a single stroke!

subtitles.original: 終わりなき輪廻...
subtitles.english: Endless cycle of rebirth...

subtitles.original: Now Loading
subtitles.english: Now Loading
